title: shambho siva
sahitya:
shambhO shiva shankara guru ambOruha nayana

caraNam 1

 dharaNidhara vara bhUSaNa sura sEvita caraNa
   
caraNam 2

 taruNAruNa kiranAbha sucaraNa sura haraNa
   
caraNam 3

 kamanIya nigama sannuta hima girirAja ramaNa
   
caraNam 4

 shamanAntaka vimalAnga parama kAruNya nidhE
   
caraNam 5

 samalankrta kamalahita kamalAsuta haraNa
   
caraNam 6

 nata pOSaNa hita bhASaNa dhrta cArukuranga
   
caraNam 7

 mata bhEda patita mAnava mada santata bhanga
   
caraNam 8

 sutabOdhana hitakara pAlita tyAgarAja
